news.headline: Foxconn sees robust AI demand continuing after Q2 profit tops forecast
news.summary: TAIPEI (Reuters) -Foxconn expects higher third-quarter revenue, it said on Thursday, on robust demand for artificial intelligence servers, which helped the world's largest contract electronics maker report a forecast-beating 27% increase in second-quarter profit. news.headline: Podcast: Hopes for Interest-Rate Cut Lead to Modest Stock Gains
news.summary: Plus: Shares in the crypto-exchange operator Bullish jumped 84% in their first day of trading. The IPO raised $1.1 billion. And Amazon's news that it's launching same-day grocery delivery caused shares of Kroger, Walmart, DoorDash and Instacart to fall.

news.headline: Heard on the Street Recap: Anxiety in the Grocery Space
news.summary: Amazon plans a massive expansion of its grocery-delivery business, a move to boost growth in one of the few retail arenas in which it doesn’t yet have a dominant position.  Shares of grocery companies fell on the news of Amazon’s expansion, with Instacart-owner Maplebear sinking 12%, DoorDash down 3

news.headline: S&P 500 Gains & Losses Today: Amazon Expands Same-Day Food Deliveries, Hitting Kroger, DoorDash
news.summary: The S&P 500 added 0.3% on Wednesday, Aug. 13, 2025, posting a record closing high for the second straight day after mellow inflation data raised rate-cut expectations.

news.headline: Cisco projects upbeat quarterly revenue as AI fuels networking equipment demand
news.summary: (Reuters) -Cisco Systems forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as the artificial intelligence boom boosted demand for its networking equipment from cloud customers.
